prod_short_desc: Play and learn all day long at the LEGO® DUPLO® Preschool!
prod_long_desc:
Play out real-life scenarios in LEGO® DUPLO® My Town: a recognizable world with modern DUPLO figures. Toddlers will love showing you their preschool day with this colorful DUPLO set, from playtime on the mat, lunch, and toileting routines to tidy-up time. Help reinforce your child’s learning and encourage early role-play skills. Includes three DUPLO figures.
Includes three LEGO® DUPLO® figures: a preschool teacher and two children.
Features a preschool building with an opening door, shelf, opening drawers and a toilet area with washbasin.
Includes bricks decorated with numbers 1 to 3, a book, sandwiches, child’s drawing, toilet paper, hand soap, and a preschool sign as story starters.
Accessory elements include a fabric play mat, two chairs, cup and a jug.
Use the modern characters, accessories and decorated bricks to help your toddler learn 1-2-3 or practice key routines as they play.
Let your child show you their favorite part of the preschool day—there’s so much to explore in this exciting set!
LEGO® DUPLO® products are specially designed to be safe and suitable for small hands.
This set offers an age-appropriate build and play experience for ages 2-5.
Preschool measures over 6” high, 7” wide and 3” long.
There are several My Town products to collect and play out your child’s everyday life in a recognizable LEGO® DUPLO® world.
